title: PACT Act
content:
'''PACT Act''' may refer to:

* The Prevent All Cigarette Trafficking (PACT) Act of 2009, an [[List of acts of the 111th United States Congress|act of the 111th United States Congress]]
* The [[Blair Brandt#Animal welfare advocacy|Preventing Animal Cruelty and Torture (PACT) Act]], a United States animal welfare act of the 116th United States Congress
* The [[Honoring our PACT Act of 2022|Honoring our Promise to Address Comprehensive Toxics (PACT) Act of 2022]], a United States veterans healthcare act of 117th United States Congress

{{Disambiguation}}
